QuestData.Title: The Power of the Maw
QuestData.Description:
Lysonia flees to the Maw to enact her dark rituals. As the Maw Walker, you are the only one who can pursue her.
Take Kleia and my blade. She must be stopped.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Maw with Kleia, then meet her outside Perdition Hold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Kleia outside Perdition Hold.
